title: Let's give Volibear grizzly buffs for no reason
body:
* The further Volibear runs with rolling thunder, the further he throws champions behind him
* Rolling Thunder's damage scales with move speed as bonus true damage 
* AP scalings on his E and R increase with every champ he munches with W
* If Rolling Thunder grabs a minion, Volibear will not let go till he smashes a champion with it dealing bonus True Max % Tilt Damage
* Volibear can't die till his passive finishes regenerating HP, enemy champions must wait till it comes off CD
* When R kills a target they explode dealing Max % Grizzly Damage to the summoners soul
* If E would kill a minion it transforms it into a rabid cub that does not snivel
* Every time Volibear activates his passive and lives, it gets stronger
* If Volibear is in the Jungle Mendelssohn's - Hebrides Overture plays globally
* Every time Volibear clears a Jungle camp it's replaced with GRIZZLY BEARS, that deal MAX % GRIZZLY DAMAGE
* When Volibear kills Rift herald he summons polar bears in every lane and enemy fountain, they are immune to damage and the decay of time and space
* Volibear is immune to fear because the Ursine have no fear
* If you get an S on Volibear Rito will send you Polar bears every christmas
* When Volibear clears Jungle camps it adds an orbiting cub that is consumed when hit by CC negating its effects
